title: SSR Dev Server Target
description: SSR Dev Server target options for Build Facade.

port.description: Port to start the development server at. Default is 4200. Pass 0 to get a dynamically assigned port.

publicHost.description: The URL that the browser client should use to connect to the development server. Use for a complex dev server setup, such as one with reverse proxies.

open.description: Opens the url in default browser.

progress.description: Log progress to the console while building.
